summary: The "Honoring Our Heroes Act of 2025" (H.R. 2721) directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to establish a pilot program to provide headstones or burial markers for veterans who died on or before November 1, 1990. The program will operate for two years after the act's enactment. The bill also requires an update to the National Cemetery Administration's website regarding eligibility for headstones and markers. Applications are required, and the definition of a covered veteran is provided, referencing Title 38 of the United States Code.
